name: Emblem of Severed Fate
description:
After another character of yours uses an Elemental Burst: The character to which this is attached gains 1 Energy.
The DMG dealt by the character's Elemental Bursts is increased by 2 (once per Round).
(A character can equip a maximum of 1 Artifact)
descriptionraw: <color=#FFFFFFFF>After another character of yours uses an Elemental Burst: </color>The character to which this is attached gains 1 $[K310].\nThe DMG dealt by the character's Elemental Bursts is increased by 2 (once per Round).\n(A character can equip a maximum of 1 {SPRITE_PRESET#3004}Artifact)
descriptionreplaced: <color=#FFFFFFFF>After another character of yours uses an Elemental Burst: </color>The character to which this is attached gains 1 <color=#FFFFFFFF>{SPRITE_PRESET#1110}Energy</color>.\nThe DMG dealt by the character's Elemental Bursts is increased by 2 (once per Round).\n(A character can equip a maximum of 1 {SPRITE_PRESET#3004}Artifact)
storytitle: Emblem of Severed Fate: Ornate Kabuto
storytext:
Thirteen years went by like a dream.
The scarlet snow flies through the shadowed pass like smoke.
You have now gone afar.
